title:  footer-4col-menu
author: kelly@nexuspoint.co.uk
    
#   Full width element with it's own .sw internal wrapper

#   Useage


```
<footer-4col-menu>
	<template slot="content-1">
		<h1>Heading</h1>

		<ul>
			<li><a href="#" title="[placeholder]">Lorem ipsum dolor</a></li>
			<li><a href="#" title="[placeholder]">Sit amet velsem</a></li>
			<li><a href="#" title="[placeholder]">Consectetur adipiscing</a></li>
			<li><a href="#" title="[placeholder]">Donec diam</a></li>
			<li><a href="#" title="[placeholder]">Mauris volutpat diam</a></li>
		</ul>
	</template>

	<template slot="content-2">
		<h1>Heading</h1>

		<ul>
			<li><a href="#" title="[placeholder]">Lorem ipsum dolor</a></li>
			<li><a href="#" title="[placeholder]">Sit amet velsem</a></li>
			<li><a href="#" title="[placeholder]">Consectetur adipiscing</a></li>
			<li><a href="#" title="[placeholder]">Donec diam</a></li>
			<li><a href="#" title="[placeholder]">Mauris volutpat diam</a></li>
		</ul>
	</template>

	<template slot="content-3">
		<h1>Heading</h1>

		<ul>
			<li><a href="#" title="[placeholder]">Lorem ipsum dolor</a></li>
			<li><a href="#" title="[placeholder]">Sit amet velsem</a></li>
			<li><a href="#" title="[placeholder]">Consectetur adipiscing</a></li>
			<li><a href="#" title="[placeholder]">Donec diam</a></li>
			<li><a href="#" title="[placeholder]">Mauris volutpat diam</a></li>
		</ul>
	</template>

	<template slot="content-4">
		<h1>Heading</h1>

		<ul>
			<li><a href="#" title="[placeholder]">Lorem ipsum dolor</a></li>
			<li><a href="#" title="[placeholder]">Sit amet velsem</a></li>
			<li><a href="#" title="[placeholder]">Consectetur adipiscing</a></li>
			<li><a href="#" title="[placeholder]">Donec diam</a></li>
			<li><a href="#" title="[placeholder]">Mauris volutpat diam</a></li>
		</ul>
	</template>
</footer-4col-menu>
```
